lunch.name: Herbed Chicken Salad Bowl
lunch.instructions: Cook quinoa. Grill chicken with herbs. Toss greens, tomatoes, quinoa, and feta with vinaigrette. Slice chicken and serve on top.

dinner.name: Citrus Herb Salmon
dinner.instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Arrange salmon and asparagus on tray. Drizzle olive oil, orange zest, and garlic. Roast 12 minutes and finish with dill.

breakfast.name: Avocado Toast with Eggs
breakfast.instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lemon juice and spread over toast. Top with fried eggs and sprinkle chili flakes.

breakfast.name: Avocado Tuna Toast
breakfast.instructions: Mix tuna with avocado and lemon. Spread on toast. Add salt.

lunch.name: Chicken & Avocado Salad
lunch.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Drizzle with olive oil.

dinner.name: Slow Cooker Beef Tacos
dinner.instructions: Cook beef, seasoning, sauce, onion in slow cooker. Serve in tortillas.

breakfast.name: Avocado Toast w/ Tomato
breakfast.instructions: Mash avocado on toast. Top with tomato, salt, and pepper.

lunch.name: Leftover Beef Tacos
lunch.instructions: Heat beef. Fill tortillas with beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

dinner.name: One-Pot Chicken & Rice
dinner.instructions: Cook all ingredients in one pot until rice is cooked.

breakfast.name: Avocado Tuna Melt
breakfast.instructions: Mix tuna, avocado, mayo. Put on bread with cheese. Melt.

lunch.name: Chicken & Rice Bowl
lunch.instructions: Combine chicken, rice, soy sauce, sesame oil, and green onion.

dinner.name: Slow Cooker Chicken Tacos
dinner.instructions: Cook chicken, seasoning, salsa in slow cooker. Shred and serve in tortillas with lime.

breakfast.name: Avocado & Lime Toast
breakfast.instructions: Mash avocado on toast. Squeeze lime juice, add salt and pepper.

lunch.name: Leftover Chicken Tacos
lunch.instructions: Heat chicken. Fill tortillas with chicken, salsa, avocado, and lettuce.

dinner.name: One-Pot Beef & Pasta
dinner.instructions: Cook all ingredients in one pot until pasta is cooked.

breakfast.name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
breakfast.instructions: Mix tuna with mayonnaise. Put on bread with lettuce and tomato.

lunch.name: Beef & Pasta Leftovers
lunch.instructions: Heat beef and pasta. Top with cheese and basil.

dinner.name: Chicken Taco Salad
dinner.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl.

breakfast.name: Avocado with Everything Bagel Seasoning
breakfast.instructions: Mash avocado on toast. Sprinkle with seasoning, salt, and pepper.

lunch.name: Tuna Lettuce Wraps
lunch.instructions: Mix tuna, mayo, celery, and lemon juice. Wrap in lettuce leaves.

dinner.name: Slow Cooker Beef & Bean Chili
dinner.instructions: Cook all ingredients in slow cooker.

breakfast.name: Tuna & Avocado Salad
breakfast.instructions: Mix tuna, avocado, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

lunch.name: Leftover Beef Chili
lunch.instructions: Heat beef chili. Top with cheese, sour cream, and onion.

dinner.name: One-Pot Chicken Fajitas
dinner.instructions: Cook all ingredients in one pot. Serve in tortillas.
